text.p: SGC Capital - (built 1996) 180,000 dwt del Rotterdam early March trip via Brazil redel South Korea $21,000 daily Hanjin.
Successor - (built 1985) 170,552 dwt del Passero mid Feb trip via Brazil redel Japan $18,750 daily K Line.
Toscanini - 161,000 dwt del ex yard Hyundai Feb seven to nine months approx. $16,000 daily.

Yamamhime Maru - (built 1985) 139,000 dwt del Port Talbot early Feb trip Prodeco redel Rotterdam $14,325 daily HMM. K Prime - (built 1981) 134,000 dwt del Kaohsiung mid Feb trip via Australia redel Jaoan approx. $15,000 daily Japanese charterers. Oceanus - (built 1993) 73,670 dwt 14 on 30 plus one del passing Singapore end Jan four to six months redel Far East $10,750 daily Pan Ocean.
Big Sky - (built 1994) 69,189 dwt 13.5 on 28 del USG early Feb trip Far East $13,200 daily plus $210,000 bb Halla.
Navios Bulker - (built 1981) 69,373 dwt 13.5 on 38 plus 1.5 del Dalrymple Bay 9-15/2 trip Inchon $9,200 daily plus $110,000 bb HMM.
Menalon - (built 1976) 66,464 dwt 13 on 34 plus 2.5 del Tampa prompt trip China $12,000 daily plus $220,000 bb Seyang.
